content.rendered:
Our Services

SKILLVIRE's

We at SKILLVIRE provide the best guidance in psychological research to Indian students. This service is specially designed for students who have difficulty researching by themselves & who need constant support along with learning. With our professional & experienced guidance, you can complete your project in time with the required standards. Whether it is a research proposal or a synopsis, a term paper or an assignment, a dissertation or a thesis, a research paper or a conference presentation, we help students in research planning, assist them in data analysis (qualitative or quantitative), and guide them in the documentation.

  • We believe in empowering students so, we help, guide, & assist (the way how the real guide works).
  • We help in domain selection, research type selection, variable selection, sample design, topic, and methodology formulation.
  • We provide access to the limited access research papers and psychological tools, and we also help in the data analysis.
  • We guide in framing the introduction, rationale, research gaps, results, discussions, references, etc. for a publication-fit manuscript.

You can take advantage of our free basic-level guidance about how to initiate/ carry out a research in psychology by contacting us. To apply for any of our service, choose from the options below.

Qualitative Analysis

Read more about this service below

Qualitative Analysis

Price: 850 INR

Buy now
Solutions we provide

We can assist you in doing/ building these things out of your qualitative data -
  • Qualitative content analysis (inductive or deductive) of transcripts, audio, video, images, documents, etc.
  • Qualitative network maps.
  • Groundedness of codes.
  • Code co-occurrence data.
  • Intercoder agreement.
  • And much more...

Key takeaways

You would get -
  • Analysis output.
  • Results.

Quantitative Analysis

Read more about this service below

Quantitative Analysis

Price: 650 INR

Buy now
Solutions we provide

We can assist you in doing/ building/ calculating these things out of your quantitative data -
  • Data scoring.
  • Frequency distribution table.
  • Graphs or charts.
  • Descriptive statistics (mean, median, mode, average deviation, standard deviation, variance, quartile deviation, standard error of mean, skewness, kurtosis).
  • Dealing with outliers.
  • Normality testing.
  • Assumptions testing.
  • 2 independent or paired sample tests (parametric or non parametric).
  • K independent or paired sample tests (parametric or non parametric).
  • Correlation (parametric or non parametric).
  • Regression (simple linear, multiple linear, multivariate linear).
  • Internal consistency.
  • And much more...

Key takeaways

You would get -
  • Scored or treated data.
  • Analysis output file.
  • Results.

Review of Literature

Read more about this service below

Review of Literature

Price: 1200 INR

Buy now
Solutions we provide

We can guide you in -
  • Topic selection.
  • Methodological framing.
  • Finding literature.
  • Tabulations.
  • Documentation.
  • Referencing.
  • And much more...

Key takeaways

You would get -
  • Credible databases for search (researches, thesis, and e-books)
  • Full access of almost all research papers and books.
  • Assistance in basic grammar and plagiarism checking.
  • Dedicated personal guidance at every stage.

Research Proposal

Read more about this service below

Research Proposal

Price: 2500 INR

Buy now
Solutions we provide

We can guide you in -
  • Topic selection.
  • Finding research gaps and rationale.
  • Methodological framing (qualitative or quantitative or mixed).
  • Finding literature.
  • Tabulations.
  • Finding tools.
  • Framing proposed outcomes.
  • Documentation.
  • Referencing.
  • And much more...

Key takeaways

You would get -
  • Credible databases for search (researches, thesis, and e-books)
  • Full access of almost all research papers and books.
  • Accessibility of psychological tools (free to use for research purpose only)
  • Assistance in basic grammar and plagiarism checking.
  • Dedicated personal guidance at every stage.

Full Research Guidance

Read more about this service below

Full Research Guidance

Price: 3600 INR

Buy now
Solutions we provide

We can guide/ assist you in -
  • Topic selection.
  • Finding research gaps and rationale.
  • Finding literature.
  • Methodological framing (qualitative or quantitative).
  • Building ethical statements.
  • Sample design.
  • Finding tools.
  • Scoring.
  • Data treatment and assumptions testing.
  • Data analysis (qualitative or quantitative).
  • Tabulations.
  • Documentation.
  • Referencing.
  • And much more...

Key takeaways

You would get -
  • Credible databases for search (researches, thesis, and e-books).
  • Full access of almost all research papers and books.
  • Accessibility of psychological tools (free to use for research purpose only).
  • Results of the data analysis.
  • Assistance in basic grammar and plagiarism checking.
  • Dedicated personal guidance at every stage.

Custom Service

Custom Service

Price: Negotiable

Contact us
